trial_identification.studytitle: Randomised 12 month trial of Non-Invasive Ventilation (NIV) with or without oxygen versus oxygen alone in treatment of sleep disordered breathing in Cystic Fibrosis
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Randomised 12 month trial of Non-Invasive Ventilation (NIV) with or without oxygen versus oxygen alone in treatment of sleep disordered breathing in Cystic Fibrosis

interventions.interventions: Patients will be randomised to oxygen alone or NIV with or without oxygen, as titrated during polysomnography to maintain oxygen saturation >=90% in all sleep stages. Patients will be followed-up over 12 months. Repeat sleep studies at 3, 6 and 12 months. They will be censored if they undergo lung transplant or die. They cease the trial if defined as a 'treatment failure'

primaryOutcome.outcome: Number of treatment failures (PaCO2>60 or an increase >10mmHg from baseline; or increase TcCO2>10 from awake to sleep).
primaryOutcome.timepoint: This is time-to-event data, so "treatment failure" will be recorded if it occurs any time from baseline (day 0) within the 12 month time frame of the study.

primaryOutcome.outcome: Change in daytime PaCO2 from baseline to 12 months.

secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Total days on IV antibiotics within the 12 month study

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Days in hospital (excluding trial measurement days)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Total days in hospital (excluding trial measurement days) within the 12 month study
Total direct medical costs within the 12 month study

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: Stable CF adults with total sleep time minimum average oxygen saturation <=90%
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: Acute unstable hypercapnic respiratory failure (PaCO2>60; eligible for randomisation after acute treatment if stable off NIV for a minimum of two weeks); severe co-existing disease; persistent pneumothoraces; sputum colonised with burkolderia cepacia.

sponsorship.primarysponsoraddress: Level 11, KGV Building Missenden Road Camperdown NSW 2050

fundingsource.fundingaddress: Director, Research Administration Section National Health and Medical Research Council GPO Box 1421 Canberra ACT 2601

ethicsAndSummary.summary: Last participant recruited 16/4/2010. Recruitment halted 2015 as no participant recruited in last 5 years. Data analysis ongoing.
